info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 05 at 7:27PM CST until March 05 at 7:45PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN VERNON COUNTY... At 727 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Schell City to 6 miles northwest of Sheldon, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Nevada... Montevallo... Walker... Schell City... Moundville... Milo... Harwood... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 80 and 96. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
